attributes.action: Stop using Unemployment as a Continuation of Punishment  - Reform of the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974
attributes.additional_details:
The findings from the 2013 research entitled, 'Nothing to Declare' (Barlow and Barnett, 2013) demonstrate that Employers in East Lancashire, agree that is
'"is in no-ones interest for unemployment to be used as a continuation of punishment".

The Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974 must be amended to bring all determinate sentences within it's scope, immediately and retrospectively.
